raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "happi" %}
{% set version = "1.4.0" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/pcdshub/{{ name }}/archive/v{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 6135928358a329e715758624cfcc95c902d4ddc936bc8e29dd2d356874611153

build:
  noarch: python
  number: 0
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv"

requirements:
  host:
    - python >=3.6
    - pip
  run:
    - python >=3.6
    - jinja2
    - prettytable
    - simplejson
    - coloredlogs

test:
  imports:
    - happi 

about:
  home: https://github.com/pcdshub/happi 
  license: SLAC Open
  license_family: OTHER
  license_file: LICENSE.md
  summary: 'Heuristic Access to Positions of Photon Instruments'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - hhslepicka
    - klauer
    - ZLLentz
